title: Allison Schmitt: Speed Takes Progress - adidas
description:
Sometimes it takes defeat to push forward. Disappointment can come with lessons you don’t get from victory. Allison Schmitt uses her defeats as fuel in her hunt for success. To her, they are a blessing in disguise. They help her reach that bit further and push that bit harder. Speed takes progress. Schmitt is a creator of speed.

-------------------------------------

Warning: This video contains flashing imagery. Viewer discretion advised.

From the pool to the hockey field. From spikes on the track to spikes on the volleyball court. From kick-off to the final whistle, adidas supports and encourages the love of sport, no matter the game. 

adidas sponsors some of the best athletes in the world including: Ajee Wilson, Tori Bowie, Shaunae Miller, Morgan Brian, Simona Halep, Garbiñe Muguruza, Ellie Simmonds, Jaqueline Carvalho, Allison Schmitt, Tyla Nathan-Wong, Eva De Goede, Jessica Ennis-Hill, Bia & Bianca, Mayra Aguiar, Rosangela Santos and Laura Trott.

asset.author: adidas

transcripts: If I'm behind in a race I know that it's my race and I know exactly how to swim it. I'll put my head down and put everything I have into that last 50 meters to hit the wall first I've learned a lot more from my disappointments than I did for my successes especially me always wants the success in the pool and having those disappointments I feel like it's a blessing in disguise but has helped me become a better person and swimmer. I learned from defeat and know what I have to work on to be successful the next time I know that I'm gonna have to have a goal each day so that I can stay on that path and accomplish my ultimate goals.
